name.description: The name of the advertiser or company.

address.description: The physical address of the advertiser.

company.description: The name of the company associated with the advertiser.

contacter.description: The contact person for the advertiser.

country.description: The country where the advertiser is located.

currency.description: The currency used for transactions in the account.

description.description: A brief description or bio of the advertiser or company.

email.description: The email address associated with the advertiser.

industry.description: The industry or sector the advertiser operates in.

language.description: The preferred language of communication for the advertiser.

license_no.description: The license number of the advertiser.

license_url.description: The URL link to the advertiser's license documentation.

cellphone_number.description: The cellphone number of the advertiser.

promotion_area.description: The specific area or region where the advertiser focuses promotion.

rejection_reason.description: Reason for any advertisement rejection by the platform.

role.description: The role or position of the advertiser within the company.

status.description: The current status of the advertiser's account.

timezone.description: The timezone setting for the advertiser's activities.

balance.description: The current balance in the advertiser's account.

create_time.description: The timestamp when the advertiser account was created.

telephone_number.description: The telephone number of the advertiser.

promotion_center_province.description: The province or state at the center of the advertiser's promotion activities.

advertiser_account_type.description: The type of advertiser's account (e.g., individual, business).

license_city.description: The city where the advertiser's license is registered.

brand.description: The brand name associated with the advertiser.

license_province.description: The province or state where the advertiser's license is registered.

promotion_center_city.description: The city at the center of the advertiser's promotion activities.
